00067   PrefixedOutStream(std::ostream& destination,
00068                     const char* prefix,
00069                     bool ignoreInput = false,
00070                     bool fatal = false) :
00071       destination(destination),
00072       ignoreInput(ignoreInput),
00073       prefix(prefix),
00074       // We want the first call to operator<< to prefix the prefix so we set
00075       // carriageReturned to true.
00076       carriageReturned(true),
00077       fatal(fatal)
00078     { /* nothing to do */ }
